Modification of
			 per-fiscal year calculation of days of certain active duty or active service to
			 reduce eligibility age for retirement for non-regular service

Section 12731(f)(2)(A) of title 10, United
			 States Code

quote.#text: in any two consecutive fiscal years

header.#text:
Accumulation of
			 90-Day periods of service within any two consecutive fiscal years

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2008

current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend title 10, United States Code, to modify the
		  per-fiscal year calculation of days of certain active duty or active service
		  used to reduce the minimum age at which a member of a reserve component of the
		  uniformed services may retire for non-regular service.
